Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer erred in rejecting Mr. Grewal's application based on language skills and likelihood of departure
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) s. 11(1), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (IRPR) s. 200
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer doubted applicant's intent to depart based on socio-economic factors
Crimes.Evidence_Type: IELTS scores, personal circumstances (age, marital status, mobility)
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged unreasonable refusal of temporary work permit
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Insufficient language proficiency and risk of overstaying
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decisions
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonable and fair assessment under IRPA/IRPR
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Error in assessing language ability and intent to depart
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inadequate language skills and perceived risk of overstaying
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Concerns about genuine intent to leave Canada
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of officer’s assessment
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Compliance with procedural fairness in decision-making

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer erred in refusing Mr. Grewal's work permit application based on language skills and likelihood of departure
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) s. 11(1), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (IRPR) s. 200
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned applicant's intent to depart due to age, marital status, and mobility
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged unreasonable refusal of work permit
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inadequate English proficiency and risk of overstaying
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decisions
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonable and fair assessment under IRPA/IRPR
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Error in assessing eligibility based on language and intent to depart
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Application dismissed, no certification of questions
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inadequate English proficiency and perceived risk of overstaying
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of officer’s findings
